casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Arthur Lee HAMES. No. 337P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Fred Lamar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. Lisa Miles, for Arthur Lee Hames.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by the Attorney General on the 21st day of June 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by the Attorney General in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
